data.title: Kowarekake no Orgel
data.meta_description: MaiOtaku is your website for meeting single anime fans, otaku, getting connected, finding love, making friends, and more.
data.text:
Rin Daughters of Mnemosyne [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Rin As?gi may look like an ordinary office lady on the outside but she is actually a private investigator taking on any jobs, from finding a stray cat to infiltrating a high-security corporate lab. 537 users added this. El Cazador de la Bruja [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Ellis, a young girl suspected of murdering prominent physicist Heinrich Schneider, is on the run from prosecution when she is tracked down by a female bounty hunter Nadie in a small Mexican town. However, instead of turning her in, Nadie impulsively decides to help her and the two embark on a journey south where they hope to find clues about Ellis' past. 142 users added this. Basilisk [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. The year is 1614 AD. Two warring ninja clans, each supporting a son of Hidetada Tokugawa as the next shogun, send ten representatives each to fight to the death for the possession of a scroll. 1337 users added this. Gun Gale Online (Sword Art Online 2) [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Ani.me's official listing has the Gun Gale Online (Sword Art Online 2) storyline, reviews, and Gun Gale Online (Sword Art Online 2) pictures that you need. Get to know everything about this Television Series show. 1941 users added this. Sword Art Online [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. In the year 2022, the gaming industry has reached a new height after the development of the NerveGear, a helmet-like controller that allows the user to fully dive their senses into the world of virtual reality. After a closed beta with only 1,000 testers, the Virtual Reality MMORPG Sword Art Online is launched. 30597 users added this. Selector Infected WIXOSS [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Ani.me's official listing has the Selector Infected WIXOSS storyline, reviews, and Selector Infected WIXOSS pictures that you need. Get to know everything about this Television Series show. 119 users added this. Sasami: Magical Girls Club [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. In this world, there live a group of people who call themselves "Majo" or "Magical Girls". They hide their powers so as to assimilate into the environment. 67 users added this. Ikoku Meiro no Croisée [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Ani.me's official listing has the Ikoku Meiro no Croisée storyline, reviews, and Ikoku Meiro no Croisée pictures that you need. Get to know everything about this Television Series show. 21 users added this. Gokukoku no Brynhildr [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. When he was a child, Murakami was infatuated with a girl he called Kuroneko. She insisted on knowing about aliens and having met them, but no one believed her, even young Murakami was skeptical. 155 users added this. Fist of the North Star [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. After a nuclear holocaust tears the world apart, mankind is forced to the harshness of not only the oppression of others who are much more powerful, but the dead earth which seems to be getting worse with every passing moment. But a savior has risen from the ashes, a man who will defeat those who would torment the weak and make the world a livable place once more. 262 users added this. Fist of the North Star [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. After a nuclear holocaust tears the world apart, mankind is forced to the harshness of not only the oppression of others who are much more powerful, but the dead earth which seems to be getting worse with every passing moment. But a savior has risen from the ashes, a man who will defeat those who would torment the weak and make the world a livable place once more. 262 users added this. Kanamemo [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. * Adaptation of Iwami Shouko's Kanamemo four-panel manga. 107 users added this. Wooser No Sono Higurashi [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. The 3D shorts center around Wooser, a mysterious mascot character whose charming appearance belies a corrupt heart 15 users added this. Vivid Red Operation [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. The story is set in a futuristic and peaceful world made possible thanks to the invention of the Manifestation Engine, a powerful engine that creates energy from the sky and helped to prevent an energy crisis five years prior. On the island of Izu Oshima, Akane Isshiki lives a peaceful life with her family. 29 users added this. Vividred Operation [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Friendship is the key to protecting the world. That is everyone's wish. 78 users added this. Knights of Sidonia [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. It's been a thousand years since the Gauna, a strange alien race with no known method of communication, destroyed the solar system. A portion of humanity managed to escape using enormous "seed ships" like the Sidonia, which have allowed them to maintain the population while drifting through space. 275 users added this. Mnemosyne [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Ani.me's official listing has the Mnemosyne storyline, reviews, and Mnemosyne pictures that you need. Get to know everything about this Television Series show. 56 users added this. Inugami-san to Nekoyama-san [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. The story revolves around Nekoyama Suzu, a timid, shy tsundere girl who loves dogs, and Inugami Yachiyo, a super masochistic, air-headed, friendly girl who loves cats. One day, after a fateful meeting, the two find themselves attracted to each other. 60 users added this. Kite [OVA] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Sawa is a school girl, an orphan, and an assassin. She is being controlled by a corrupt cop who gives her targets to kill, detailing to her the crimes these men have committed in order to justify their death. 658 users added this. El Cazador de la Bruja [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Ellis, a young girl suspected of murdering prominent physicist Heinrich Schneider, is on the run from prosecution when she is tracked down by a female bounty hunter Nadie in a small Mexican town. However, instead of turning her in, Nadie impulsively decides to help her and the two embark on a journey south where they hope to find clues about Ellis' past. 142 users added this. Shinsekai Yori [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. About one thousand years into the future, civilization has been retrograded and humans are living dispersed within small communities. People in this era have a psychic power called "Juryoku" which materializes things they imagine. 518 users added this. Kiddy Girl-and Pure [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. ES members Éclair and Lumière once were involved in a battle to decide the fate of the galaxy. They prevailed and peace was restored to the galaxy. 20 users added this. Kidou Tenshi Angelic Layer [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Misaki Suzuhara is a sixth grader who has just moved to Tokyo to live with her aunt. She stumbles across a merchandising phenomenon known as Angelic Layer in which a person can purchase a doll and custom design it. 197 users added this. Angelic Layer [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. 12-year-old Misaki Suzuhara has just gotten involved in Angelic Layer, a battling game using electronic dolls called angels. Even as a newbie, Misaki shows advanced skills as she meets new friends and enters Angelic Layer tournaments to fight the greatest Angelic Layer champions of the nation. 307 users added this. Shangri-La [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. The story is set in a neo-futuristic age, in which Tokyo has turned into the world;s largest jungle polis hat absorbs carbon dioxide. A tower city called Atlas houses the rich and privileged, and is the object of yearning of all that are not allowed to enter. 159 users added this. Shangri-La [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. The story is set in a neo-futuristic age, in which Tokyo has turned into the world;s largest jungle polis hat absorbs carbon dioxide. A tower city called Atlas houses the rich and privileged, and is the object of yearning of all that are not allowed to enter. 159 users added this. Denno Coil [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. In this future, a mobile phone like technology has people wear special visors to superimpose coordinated, instant virtual images over the top of their everyday real world. This cyberspace layer, "space", interacts perfectly as you move about or touch things. 201 users added this. Jigoku Shoujo Futakomori [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Ai Enma once again returns as the Jigoku Shoujo, who uses Jigoku Tsuushin (Hell Hotline) to allow people to post their grudges on their tormentors, sending them straight to Hell. In exchange, the users of the website will end up in Hell after they die. 189 users added this. Gatchaman Crowds [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. The story is set in Japan in the early summer of 2015. 180,000 people live in Tachikawa City, the "second metropolis" of the Tokyo area. 236 users added this. Simoun [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. In the peaceful theocracy of Simulicram, everyone is born female. At age 17, each maiden undergoes a special ceremony where she chooses her sex. 95 users added this. The World of Narue [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Iizuka Kazuto is a 14 year old boy who meets a somewhat weird but cute and charming girl named Narue Nanase who claims she is an Alien. The show is about the trials and tribulations of the young couple as they get to know each other. 71 users added this. Kanon [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Aizawa Yuichi had often visited his cousin in the city when a young child. However, something drastic happened to keep him away for seven long years. 2866 users added this. Kamichu! [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Yurie Hitotsubashi was just an average middle school student living in the city of Onomichi on Japan's Inland Sea in the easygoing times of the 1980s. She spent her days worrying about exams and trying to get Kenji, the clueless boy she likes, to notice her. 51 users added this. Ichigo Mashimaro [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Ichigo Mashimaro follows the life of Nobue Itoh, her younger sister Chika, and her friends. The basic premise of the show can be summed up in "cute girls do cute things in cute ways", be it trying to quit smoking, going outside to play, celebrating a holiday, or doing school work. 67 users added this. Jigoku Shoujo [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. There is a certain site that can be accessed at midnight. It is said that you will meet Hell Girl once you do. 2117 users added this. Strawberry Marshmallow [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Strawberry Marshmallow is about the adventures of four elementary school girls and their older sister-figure 43 users added this. Kaiba [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. A sci-fi love story set in a world where digitization of memory made physical death obsolete. A world where memories can be stolen and altered, and replaced in a new human body. 146 users added this. Another [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. In 1972, 26 years ago, a very popular honor student named Misaki died partway through the school year in Yomiyama North Middle School’s class 3-3. The rest of the students, devastated by the unexpected loss, decided to carry on as if their classmate were still alive, going so far as to keep the desk in place and bringing it to the graduation ceremony. 4984 users added this. Last EXILE [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. The story revolves around fifteen-year-old pilot Claus Valca and navigator Lavie Head, who fly their vanship as sky couriers in the nation of Anatoray. The world of Prestel, where the polluted atmosphere of the industrial revolution still lingers; where, underneath the wind and clouds, two countries, Anatorel and Dysis, confront one another in war; and where a terrible and exciting story is about to begin. 1410 users added this. Pita Ten [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Kotaro starts out as pretty much your usual kid although he lives alone with his father, which forces him to take over some of the chores at home, such as cooking and cleaning. But what starts out as a usual morning changes drastically as he opens his front door to be confronted by a girl named Misha dressed in a voluminous dress and a tendency to shout rather than speak. 159 users added this. Innocent Venus [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. In the year 2010 AD, Hyper Hurricanes born concurrently all over the world caused severe damage. Five billion people lost their lives, decreasing the world's population to 3 billion. 34 users added this. Taruto [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. It's about a neko named Taruto. She is said to be the Kinka Princess that has Magical Powers. 31 users added this. Saishuuheiki Kanojo [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Shuuji and Chise are third year student at a high school in Hokkaido. The shy Chise is finally confessing to Shuuji, and finally two of them are starting to exchange diary awkwardly. 120 users added this. Kashimashi: girl meets girl [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Hazumu was a shy boy who enjoyed gardening, collecting herbs, and long walks in the mountains. One day he finally worked up the courage to confess his love to Yasuna, but she rejected him. 147 users added this. Kasimasi Girl Meets Girl [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Hazumu is a shy and quiet boy who loves flowers and is forced to rely on his tomboy childhood friend Tomari as a bodyguard. Yasuna is the prettiest girl in school but she avoids men like the plague… until she meets Hazumu. 27 users added this. Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. She has a loving family and best friends, laughs and cries from time to time.. 225 users added this. Puella Magi Madoka Magica [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Beloved family, good friends, laughter and tears - these things make up the ordinary life of Kaname Madoka, a second year student of Mitakihara City Middle School. One night, Madoka dreams of a mysterious dark haired girl struggling against a terrible evil; the next morning she discovers that the girl, Akemi Homura, has transferred into her class. 6629 users added this. Anyamal Tantei Kiruminzoo [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10.




3 users added this. Last Exile: Fam of the Silver Wing [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. The sequel to Last Exile. Taking place on Earth after the events of the original series, Fam of the Silver Wing introduces a new cast of characters. 164 users added this. Ichigo Mashimaro [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Ichigo Mashimaro follows the life of Nobue Itoh, her younger sister Chika, and her friends. The basic premise of the show can be summed up in "cute girls do cute things in cute ways", be it trying to quit smoking, going outside to play, celebrating a holiday, or doing school work. 67 users added this. Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Yuuno Scraia is a mage from a distant planet working to fix the problem he started when Jewel Seeds were accidentally spread around the world. In a failed attempt to seal a seed properly, he winds up on Earth in the form of a ferret. 286 users added this. The Girl Who Leapt Through Space [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. In the year 311 of the orbital calendar, humanity has migrated to countless colony clusters in space. Akiha Shishido encounters a malevolent artificial intelligence, Leopard, who has been installed on a colony. 18 users added this. Blue Submarine No. 6 [OVA] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. In the near future, the oceans have risen, causing all land at sea level to be flooded. With the expansion of the oceans, humanity has found a new enemy in Zorndyke. 261 users added this. C]: Control - The Money of Soul and Possibility [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Tamayura [OVA] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. (From Wikipedia): Tamayura centers around a young girl named Fu Sawatari who moves to Takehara, Hiroshima to begin her first year of high school. Her late father grew up in Takehara and this is her first time back in the town in five years. 9 users added this. Ookami Kakushi [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Kuzumi Hiroshi moves with his crippled sister and his father to the remote city of Jouga, which is famous for its hassaku citrus and the rumors that a species of enormous wolves once lived in the area. While some of the residents are more than friendly, when people begin to vanish suddenly, it becomes apparent that something sinister is afoot. 100 users added this. Shin Sekai Yori [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. About one thousand years into the future, civilization has been retrograded and humans are living dispersed within small communities. People in this era have a psychic power called "Juryoku" which materializes things they imagine. 220 users added this. MAR [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Toramizu Ginta is a young boy always dreaming of a magical world out of his reach. But his dream isn't too far off, as Ginta one day is given the chance to enter the magical world. 717 users added this. Haitai Nanafa [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Ani.me's official listing has the Haitai Nanafa storyline, reviews, and Haitai Nanafa pictures that you need. Get to know everything about this Television Series show. 3 users added this. Kurokami [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Keita Ibuki is an independent and struggling freelance computer programmer who had a chance meeting on one night with a high Mototsumitama named Kuro. He gives her his dinner, a bowl of ramen, and tries to protect her when she is attacked in an ambush by an unknown Mototsumitama. 576 users added this. Ga-rei Zero [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Opening Kensuke Nimura is your average high-school student—except he can see spirits. This ability generally hinders him more than it helps him, especially in trying to get a girlfriend. 433 users added this. Ga-Rei: Zero [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. * An anime-only prequel to the Ga-Rei manga by Segawa Hajime, serialised in Shounen Ace. Will you kill someone you love because of love? 93 users added this. Zoku Natsume Yuujinchou [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Ani.me's official listing has the Zoku Natsume Yuujinchou storyline, reviews, and Zoku Natsume Yuujinchou pictures that you need. Get to know everything about this Television Series show. 433 users added this. Natsume Yuujinchou [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. For as long as he can remember, Takashi Natsume has had the supernatural ability to interact spirits, a power he had inherited from his grandmother Reiko Natsume. Due to this strange power, Takashi had been ostracized by the other kids, and he was passed from one relative to another. 1104 users added this. Yosuga no Sora [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Yosuga no Sora ("Sky of Connection") started out as a Japanese romance/drama adult visual novel developed by Sphere. The game was originally released for Windows PC on December 5, 2008. 1031 users added this. Natsume Yujin-cho Shi [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Takashi Natsume has been able to see youkai, Japanese monsters, his whole life. He inherited a book of youkai names from his grandmother, Reiko. 46 users added this. Joshiraku [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Joshiraku is a satirical comedy anime that follows the everyday life of a group of girls. An adaptation of a manga written by the author of Sayonara Zetsubou Sensei about group of girls who discuss random things and usually reach an unusual or humorous conclusion that's far from the initial discussion topic. 126 users added this. oh! edo rocket [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. In Edo during the mid-1800's, fireworks maker Seikichi Tamaya and his friends struggle to live under the harsh frugality laws imposed by the strict city magistrate, which ban all luxuries, including fireworks. One day, a strange girl stops by Seikichi's shop with an equally strange request: she wants Seikichi to build a firework that can reach the moon. 53 users added this. Sasameki Koto [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Sumika Murasame is deeply in love with her cheerful classmate and friend Ushio Kazama. Ushio is openly lesbian but. 262 users added this. Natsume Yujin-cho [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Natsume Takashi has the ability to see spirits, which he has long kept secret. However, once he inherits a strange book that belonged to his deceased grandmother, Reiko, he discovers the reason why spirits surround him. 80 users added this. When They Cry [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Higurashi When They Cry (?? 526 users added this. Ga-Rei-Zero [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. The anime is a prequel story set before the events of the manga. It's tells the story of Kagura Tsuchimiya and Yomi Isayama, swordswoman and heirs from a long line of Japanese exorcist families. 267 users added this. Jigoku Shoujo Mitsuganae [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. After the events of the 2nd season, Ai's three helpers, Ichimoku Ren, Wanyuudou and Hone-Onna live out their lives in relative peace. This is suddenly shattered when Kikuri returns to recruit them. 162 users added this. Jigoku Shoujo Futakomori [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Ai Enma once again returns as the Jigoku Shoujo, who uses Jigoku Tsuushin (Hell Hotline) to allow people to post their grudges on their tormentors, sending them straight to Hell. In exchange, the users of the website will end up in Hell after they die. 189 users added this. Chi's Sweet Home [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. After being separated from her mother, Chi finds a new home with a small family at an apartment complex. Even though the landlord's rules outlaw cats living in the apartments, the family takes the helpless kitten in and give her a new home. 154 users added this. Wagaya no Oinari-sama [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. T?ru and Noburo are brothers of the Takagami Family. 30 users added this. Galaxy Angel [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. The Angel Brigade, an elite branch of the Transbaal Empire military, are assigned to search for The Lost Technology, mysterious items from the past that hold unknown powers. Led by the soon-to-retire Colonel Volcott O' Huey, the Angel Brigade travels to different planets using their specially designed Emblem Frame ships to search for Lost Technology. 178 users added this. Galaxy Angel 4 [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Ani.me's official listing has the Galaxy Angel 4 storyline, reviews, and Galaxy Angel 4 pictures that you need. Get to know everything about this Television Series show. 20 users added this. Asobi ni Ikuyo! [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. The story centers around Kio Kakazu , a high school freshman living in Okinawa. During a memorial service for one of his family ancestors. 121 users added this. Asobi ni iku yo [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. The story revolves around Kio Kakazu. A girl with cat ears appears before him during a memorial service for one of his family ancestors. 139 users added this. Cat Planet Cuties [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. She’s as frisky as she is curvy – and kitty wants to play! The flirty fun begins when nice guy Kio has a close encounter with a sexy, alien cat-girl named Eris. 752 users added this. AKB0048 Next Stage [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. In the months after the understudy's debut concert on Lancaster, the Deep Galactic Trade Organization [DGTO] and DES have stepped up their anti-entertainment attacks. In response, AKB0048 changes direction and brings back the general elections and the center nova position. 72 users added this. AKB0048 [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. In the beginning of the 21st century, a world war breaks out over interplanetary travel tech. The environment is pretty much destroyed so mankind leaves Earth and starts Star Calendar 00. 224 users added this. Galaxy Angel Z [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. In the far future, the human race advanced to space, and prospered. However, Jikushin ( earthquake of time and space ) which occurred suddenly intercepted all networks, and all the civilizations were reset. 33 users added this. Ayakashi [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Adapted from the 2005 adults-only superhuman battle action visual novel game Ayakashi. Ayakashi is a parasite life force that gives superpowers to its host, taking in return the host's entire life force. 103 users added this. Toaru Kagaku no Railgun [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Academy City is a highly developed place in terms of technology. It is said to be 20 to 30 years ahead of the rest of the world. 1500 users added this. Toaru Kagaku no Railgun S [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. The second season will focus on The Sisters Arc. Lasting only a single volume in the Toaru Majutsu no Index light novels, it was later expanded greatly in the Toaru Kagaku no Railgun manga. 469 users added this. Dantalian no Shoka [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Hugh Anthony Disward inherits an old mansion and a personal library from his grandfather. In the basement of the mansion, he meets a mysterious girl—Dalian. 97 users added this. The Mystic Archives of Dantalian [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Hugh Anthony Disward inherits an old mansion and a personal library from his grandfather. In the basement of the mansion, he meets a mysterious girl, Dalian. 37 users added this. Dantalian no Shoka [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Hugh Anthony Disward inherits an old mansion and a personal library from his grandfather. In the basement of the mansion, he meets a mysterious girl—Dalian. 97 users added this. Kannagi [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. * Based on the manga series of the same name authored and illustrated by Takenashi Eri, serialised in Comic REX. 318 users added this. Rozen Maiden: Traumend [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. As summer break arrives for the students, Jun Sakurada is busily studying on his own in the library, making up for time lost while he had confined himself to his home. Meanwhile, his Rozen Maiden doll, Shinku, has been having troubling dreams of late. 172 users added this. Kannagi: Crazy Shrine Maidens [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. An art student named Jin Mikuriya carves a statue from the wood of the Kannagi tree only to have the statue come to life in the form of a goddess, who has now taken over the statue. He and "Nagi" work together to destroy the impurities that are gathering in the town. 107 users added this. Kannagi: Crazy Shrine Maidens [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. An art student named Jin Mikuriya carves a statue from the wood of the Kannagi tree only to have the statue come to life in the form of a goddess, who has now taken over the statue. He and "Nagi" work together to destroy the impurities that are gathering in the town. 107 users added this. Unbreakable Machine-Doll [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Ani.me's official listing has the Unbreakable Machine-Doll storyline, reviews, and Unbreakable Machine-Doll pictures that you need. Get to know everything about this Television Series show. 99 users added this. Galilei Donna [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Three sisters, Hozuki, Kazuki, and Hazuki, are descendants of Galileo and have completely different personalities and tastes; they never meet eye-to-eye. One day the girls are suddenly attacked by a mysterious organisation. 23 users added this. A Certain Scientific Railgun [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. In the futuristic Academy City, which is made up of 80% students, many of whom are espers possessing unique psychic powers, Mikoto Misaka is an electromaster who is the third strongest of a mere seven espers who have been given the rank of Level 5. The series focuses on the exploits of Mikoto and her friends; Kuroko Shirai, Kazari Uiharu, and Ruiko Saten, prior to and during the events of A Certain Magical Index. 429 users added this. Shonen Onmyouji [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Abe no Masahiro is the grandson of the great omnyouji Abe no Semei, who passed his teachings on to his grandson. Masahiro lost his sixth sense and the ability to see spirits, but with Mokkun as his guide, he works to become his grandfather's successor. 31 users added this. JYU-OH-SEI [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Thor and his twin brother, Rai, are cast off to a forsaken planet by unknown masked men after witnessing the suspicious death of their parents. Given only a beam knife and a smelly satchel, they wander together in search of civilization on the primarily plant based world. 205 users added this. Higurashi no Naku Koro ni [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. On June 1983, Keiichi Maebara moves with his family to Hinamizawa, a peaceful rural village. He quickly befriends his new schoolmates Rena Ryugu, Mion Sonozaki, Satoko Hojo, and Rika Furude, usually spending their leisure time playing board games. 4599 users added this. Card Captors [TV] Kowarekake no Orgel gave it a 10. Ten-year-old fourth grader Sakura Kinomoto opens a mysterious book in her father's study and accidentally releases the magical Clow Cards.
